description: Total number of digits in all primes with n digits.
mathematica: Flatten[Table[n*Differences[PrimePi[{10^(n - 1), 10^n}]], {n, 13}]] (* _Jayanta Basu_, Jun 27 2013 *)With[{nn=14},Differences[PrimePi[10^Range[0,nn]]]*Range[nn]] (* This program generates only the first 14 terms of the sequence; Mathematica's PrimePi function cannot generate the 15th or higher terms *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 22 2016 *)
author: _Enoch Haga_
extensions: Corrected by _Jud McCranie_ and _N. J. A. Sloane_.
